name: Charlotte Chiffon
text: On Play You may trash the top or bottom card of your Life: Place up to 1 card from the top of your deck at the top of your Life.

effect.text: You may trash the top or bottom card of your Life: Place up to 1 card from the top of your deck at the top of your Life.

meta.notes: Rarity 'C' is confirmed from the bottom right corner of the card. The card is a Character with Yellow color and Wisdom attribute. The text is fully readable.
